titles.title: I hear the words of love

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I hear the words of love, I gaze upon the blood, I see the mighty sacrifice, And I have peace with God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}’Tis everlasting peace! Sure as Jehovah’s Name, ’Tis stable as His steadfast throne, For evermore the same.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My love is ofttimes low, My joy still ebbs and flows, But peace with Him remains the same, No change my Savior knows.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And yonder is my peace, The grave of all my woes! I know the Son of God has come, I know He died and rose.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
